name: Annoying dogs
description:
The Heroes from every universe are gone to save the World but their dogs left the building of the Woohf. You need to find everyone and bring them back to the Woohf, before they destroy all the city.

To help you in your mission, you can find information about each other. Each dog is recognizable by a cape and a collar dog, and some of them hold a weapon in their mouth. Moreover, like their owner, they have abilities and of course, it will not help you in your task.
